justification: The resume does not indicate sufficient experience in business development, which is the core requirement for the role.
The technical skills listed in the resume, such as PLC coding and HMI graphics, do not align with the business development and sales strategy focus of the job description.
There is no evidence of leadership or team management experience relevant to sales or business development.

The educational qualifications meet the minimum requirements with a Bachelor's degree completion and ongoing MBA, but there is a lack of evidence for sales processes understanding or negotiation skills.

requirements.criteria: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
Strong understanding of sales processes and negotiation skills

input.job_description:
**Business Development Manager**  
Join [Fictional Company] as a Business Development Manager, where you will lead strategies for expanding our market presence. Responsibilities include driving sales growth, developing key client relationships, and implementing innovative solutions to improve efficiencies using data-driven insights.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Identify new business opportunities and potential clients through market research and networking.
- Develop strategies to enhance business processes, improve workflows, and maximize operational efficiency.
- Work collaboratively with senior management to provide strategic recommendations based on market analysis.
- Lead and mentor a team of business development professionals, focusing on achieving company sales targets.
- Engage in high-stakes negotiation and strategy discussions with existing and potential partners.

**Preferred Skills:**

- Proficiency in business analytics tools like GA4 and Power BI.
- Strong capability in digital marketing strategies including SEO and influencer marketing.
- Expertise in using CRM tools such as JIRA and Asana.

**Our Ideal Candidate:**

You are proactive, strategic, and data-oriented with a firm background in business development and a passion for driving sales excellence. You are eager to lead and inspire a team while focusing on achieving ambitious growth targets.

Join us and be a part of a collaborative environment driving innovation and success.

[Apply Now]
input.additional_info: [Fictional Company] values candidates from top-tier universities such as [University A] and [University B]. We support diversity and inclusion in our hiring processes. Relocation assistance is provided on a case-by-case basis. We assess skills through a combination of technical interviews, case studies, and practical tests to ensure the candidate’s fitment with the organizational culture and job requirements.
minimum_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
Strong understanding of sales processes and negotiation skills

WORK EXPERIENCE

 Development of PLC coding, HMI graphics, and SCADA configurations for platforms like Allen Bradley, 
Honeywell, Schneider, Siemens, and Yokogawa.  
 Preparation of Design Documentation, such as Functional Logic Diagrams, Cause and Effects, Functional 
Requirement Specifications (FRS), Detailed Design Specification (DDS), Factory Acceptance Test (FAT), 
Site Acceptance Test (SAT), and Operation and Maintenance Manual (O &M).  
 Conducting Pre -FAT as well as FAT.  
 Designs panel drawings in AutoCAD and supervises manufacturing, covering SLDs, GA, power 
distribution, module wiring, system architecture, and heat/load calculations.  
 Communicating with Vendors/Suppliers for the sele ction of material and obtaining test certification and 
test reports.   
 Collaborated with deputy engineers and HOD to deliver spot services in alignment with the assignment's 
scope of work . 
 
 
Trainee Engineer   June 2021 – December  2021 
Naveena Denim Ltd, Lahore, Pakistan  
 
 Development of PLC/HMI logic and configuration of control modules.  
 Commissioning of VFD’s (Siemens, Delta , KEB , and Allen Bradley).  
 Preparing technical proposals and P&ID Drawings . 
 Fabrication of Brix Probe Transmitters . 
 Instrument select ion, calibration, maintenance and operation.  
 In house training of DCS/Instrumentation  PROJECTS                      
Sizing cooking unit | S7-1200, RTD module, MT8102iE1, TIA portal, Easy Builder pro  
 The unit involves  a high -pressure stainless -steel vessel . 
 The unit includes  stirrer, airtight door, water supply, steam heating, and monitoring instruments . 
 The vessel has a 1000 -liter capacity, with each inch of height containing 20 liters of liquor.  
 Increased production efficiency by 22% and reduced downtime by  14% through precise temperature and 
pressure control, with each inch of vessel height accommodating 20 liters of liquor.  
 
Skew Stretch Unit | MicroLogix 1500, encoders, HMI, RS Logix 500, Factory Talk view  
 To prevent appearance changes due to denim fabric  shrinkage causing twill shifts, skew is applied to the 
fabric.  
 For R.H twill fabric: left -hand skew applied . 
 For L.H twill  fabric:  right -hand skew applied.  
 For 1/1: no skew . 
 Achieved a 27% increase in fabric production efficiency and a 16% reduction in de fect rates by fine -tuning 
the skew application.  
 
BENNINGER AG Sizing Machine Upgradation | Simatic Manager, Combivis 6, Automation Studio  
 As a commissioning engineer , played  a pivotal role in the successful upgrad ation  of Naveena's sizing plant 
control system which was based on  S7-400 PLC and Siemens Micro master  drives . 
 Collaborated closely with project stakeholders to ensure seamless integration of new control components 
and technologies.  
 Led commissioning activities,  including system testing, troubleshooting, and optimization, which resulted 
in a 15% increase in operational efficiency and a 10% reduction in downtime.  
 Documented commissioning procedures, test results, and operational parameters, ensuring compliance wit h 
industry standards and client requirements.  
 Hardware: Simatic S7 -300: CPU 315 -NP/DP, KEB combivert S7 Drives, B&R HMI (CPU)  
 
Thermography (Levi’s Audit)  | FLIR E45 Thermal Camera, FLIR Thermal studio  
 Implemented  comprehensive thermographic inspections as part of Levi's annual audit at Naveena.  
 Utilized advanced thermal imaging technology to assess and analyze electrical (LT, HT) and  mechanical 
systems . 
 Identifying potential issues before they could impact operati ons. 
 Produced detailed reports and recommendations, contributing to enhanced safety  achieved  efficiency, and 
compliance with industry standards.
